definition: tone sandhi/modified tone/(music) to change key/modulation
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
capo
tone sandhi

sentences.english: Our experiment measured the decoherence rate by monitoring the precession of the spins .
sentences.chinese: 我們的實驗以觀察電子自旋的進動來測量變調率。

sentences.english: Because of tone change and effect of Ningyuan Guanhua, entering tone continues to evolve.
sentences.chinese: 入聲通過連讀變調，官話的影響繼續演變。

sentences.english: The government would definitely allocate funds to building larger instruments capable of picking up signal modulations.
sentences.chinese: 政府一定會撥款建造更大的儀器，能夠接受信號變調。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the technology of frequency agility and FM fixed-distance in the field of radio fuze.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了無線電引信中的頻率捷變調頻定距技術。

sentences.english: Tone sandhi is considered as a common phonetic phenomena in Chinese dialect.
sentences.chinese: 連讀變調是漢語方言中一種普遍的語音現象。

sentences.english: The tone sandhi of disyllabic word and the neutral tone.
sentences.chinese: 描寫莒南方言兩字組連讀變調及輕聲的變調。

sentences.english: The tone sandhi of disyllabic word and the neutral tone.
sentences.chinese: 描寫莒南方言兩字組連讀變調及輕聲的變調。

sentences.english: Hear a voice crack when it isn't the cracking type?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有聽過有人在不該變調的地方聲音變調了？

sentences.english: Hear a voice crack when it isn't the cracking type?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有聽過有人在不該變調的地方聲音變調了？

sentences.english: There must be no toning down of the truth, no muffling of the message for this time.
sentences.chinese: 我們不應使真理變調，也不應使現代信息無聲。

sentences.english: How much variation is there in tone throughout a typical sentence?
sentences.chinese: 在一句話裏有多少變調呢？

sentences.english: She spent hours playing her old, off-key piano.
sentences.chinese: 她時候都在彈她那架又舊變調的鋼琴。

sentences.english: He was not even nervous all speak the go tone sandhi.
sentences.chinese: 他緊張得連說話都走音變調了。

definition: conclusion/judgment/verdict
mountain and river exhausted (idiom); at the end of the line/nowhere to go
lit. to dispel the clouds and see the sun (idiom); fig. to restore justice
meaning of word/sense
red in the face/extremely angry
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
to force someone to do something
lit. chasing the wind and clutching at shadows (idiom); fig. groundless accusations/to act on hearsay evidence
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
to guide patiently and systematically (idiom)
feudalism
(idiom) (of a good outcome) unanticipated/serendipitous/fortuitous
lit. draw legs on a snake (idiom); fig. to ruin the effect by adding sth superfluous/to overdo it
universally shocking/to offend the whole of society
to tease/to poke fun at
pavilion in the air (idiom); unrealistic Utopian construction/castles in Spain/imaginary future plans
